# Cryptolens Client API for Python

This library contains helper methods to verify license keys in Python. At this point, it supports verification of the response from the server, however support for networking is coming in several days.

Below is an example of how to verify the response form the [Activate](https://app.cryptolens.io/docs/api/v3/Activate) method (assuming `Sign=True` and `SignMethod=1`).

```
from helpers import Helpers
from models import Response, RSAPublicKey

response = Response.from_string('{"licenseKey":"","signature":"","result":0,"message":""}')

pubKey = RSAPublicKey.from_string("<RSAKeyValue><Modulus></Modulus><Exponent>AQAB</Exponent></RSAKeyValue>")

print(Helpers.verify_signature(response, pubKey))
```
